about_the_game:
Venture Through a World of Classical Music in this Gospel-Inspired Tale
A violin prodigy named Lambert wakes up in a land of Classical Music. He does not recall how he got here. But it doesn't matter. All that matters is that he must destroy it, even if it means becoming Satan's pawn.

Amusia is a 2D action adventure Metroidvania game where you play as Lambert. Explore a side-scrolling semi-open world as you defend yourself against inhabitants as you destroy their world Cadenzia.

Explore a Vibrant Hand-Drawn World
Cadenzia is a world filled with different varieties of art-styles and atmospheres. The Bach Caves emanates a lonely but warm mood with its golden lit in-cave structures. Never-ending rain and thunder looms over Gravesite. The Spiritual Meadows sets a contrastingly colorful and bright aura with its watercolor style atmosphere. Explore it all while collecting helpful movement and combat abilities, and items.

Traverse the World with Tight-Knit Fluid Controls
Candenzia is filled with small nooks and crannies, and hazardous obstacles. Gracefully travel through all of it with satisfying movement mechanics such as sliding, dashing, and even gliding. This game will test tactical and meticulous use of the various movement abilities. There will also be moments of mindless fast -paced free flow movement.

Engage in Fast-Paced and Challenging Combat
Lambert will have relentless foes. Be methodical (but quick) and destroy your enemies by parrying, staggering, and punishing them.
